title: Fix 'Book Your Detail Now' hero button scroll to booking form

requirements.summary: Update the Hero CTA button to smoothly scroll to the booking form section when clicked
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Book Your Detail Now' in the Hero section smoothly scrolls the page to the booking form section at the bottom.
The scroll animation is smooth (behavior: 'smooth'), not an instant jump.
The ContactBooking section wrapper element has an id of 'contact' or 'booking' that the scroll target references.
The button works correctly on both desktop and mobile viewports.

file_operations.description: Update the 'Book Your Detail Now' button's onClick handler to use document.getElementById('contact') or document.getElementById('booking') and call scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) to smoothly scroll to the booking form section. Ensure the handler safely checks that the target element exists before calling scrollIntoView.

Add an id attribute ('contact' or 'booking') to the root wrapper element of the ContactBooking component so that the Hero button's scroll target can reference it. Verify this id matches the one used in Hero.tsx.
